article:
Lucy is my good friend. She is 13 years old. She's very clever, so I like her very much. At school her favorite _ is English. She speaks _ very well.She often takes part in the _ speech contest  in our school. Our English teacher _ her very much. She often asks Lucy to go to her home. At her home she makes good _ for Lucy.
Lucy also likes sports. At her home you can see a great _ collection. Lucy likes playing ping-pong. She often takes part in   ping-pong competition   in our city. Lucy's favorite ping-pong _ is Zhang Yining. Lucy says she wants to be a sports star. Oh, today is Lucy's birthday. Her _ have a party for her at home. If you want to go to the party, you can call Lucy at 212-0986.
